strapiPost.title: Grammy Winning Conversation
strapiPost.content:
Back in March, Professor Jeffrey Murdock from the U of A was named the winner of the 2021 Grammy Music Educator Award, and yesterday, he sat down for a conversation with KUAF to talk about the prestigious award.

  • Not one but two: Trophies, that is. In the interview, Murdock said he would receive the iconic Grammy trophy and a medallion to recognize the award.
  • Professor Murdock will essentially be the ambassador for all things music education over the next year, attending Grammy camp, appearing in other Grammy events, and other music education events.
  • While Murdock missed out on a live Grammy experience this year, he will get to attend the Grammys in person next year.

You can listen to the full interview and learn more about Murdock's background HERE.
